item.title: Some suggestions for JavaScript engineers
item.author: map[host:isaaclyman.com username:blog] (Isaac Lyman)
item.description: For years there’s been a bitter debate in the development community regarding JavaScript’s D&D alignment. Although few are brazen enough to argue that it’s Lawful, a full spectrum of opinions exists about whether it’s Good or Evil. In a surprising reversal, I’m told Jeff Atwood has recently taken the side of Evil, although he’s probably just trying to protect his “bad boy” reputation. I won’t share my opinion on the subject but perhaps a bit of history can shed some light.
